tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Saints Row the Third [Part 42] - The Knights of Victory
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: WowCrendor pleaded with Jesse to become a hard bangin' gangsta G with him in Saints Row 3. And so, falling victim to peer pressure like so many D-boyz before him, Jesse joins Crendor on what could be the the greatest example of two white boys trying to be street to ever grace the internet. Many licks were hit and OH YES, we went ham on it. God help us all... • Get epic OMFGCata gear! goo.gl or www.rodeoarcade.com • Stay connected! Twitter - twitter.com Facebook - facebook.com

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: A good video but I would have to ask of you guys to stop constantly talking because I personally like listening to the cut-scenes and dialect. Just MY personal preference, that's all.﻿
So basicly﻿ you would like to watch them play the game, without any input from them.
Kinzie be hot... don't﻿ judge me
It's not Jane its trisha﻿ from family guy
WTF is up with you and Hitler he did way les evil than the US of A is doing now The USA﻿ is the cancer of the world right now
i just realized, the one thing this game is missing is an option for the character's voice to be in old english﻿
Name is﻿ Jake
What tv show are﻿ they talking about
am I the only one who checked to see﻿ if their phone was ringing?
but not like they gonna use them.They never used assistance help in all those videos﻿ cause they still didn't learn about it rofl.
like a sir.﻿
yolo﻿
HITLER﻿ INFILTRATED THE CRIB!!!
Very cool +thumbs﻿ up, ! You have a new fan now! Hughs from Germany+++love your style! See you
Mwahahahaahahahahahaha!﻿
glad this is top comment cause Jesse and Crendor miss great dialogue like﻿ that from too much talking!
MEAN﻿ JEAN!!!!!

A good video but I would have to ask of you guys to stop constantly﻿ talking because I personally like listening to the cut-scenes and dialect. Just MY personal preference, that's all. But other than that it's a great video, well done guys.
HOT PIZZA﻿

Like MW3,Minecraft,bf3,Saints Row The Third, GTA4,Black ops, Mgs4 And All The Other Great Hits?? Even Hacks,Mods,ANd Glitches??? You Can Find It All On My Channel, Even AWESOME GIVEAWAYS, Go Check It Out, Click On My Name Next To This, Whats There To Lose? With Some Of My Giveaways You Will Most Likely﻿ Gain From Giving My Channel A Look, Gameplays,hacks,Mods,Glitches,TuT's, I Have It All, So What Are You Waiting For?? Go Check It Out, Over 155 Videos.
fuck this video ﻿
I need you to add me on face book I love﻿ it
What's with all of this..... "inyourendo?"﻿
and crendor loves you.﻿
because﻿ Hitler is Hitler
